officialTitle: Imaging of Osteonecrosis With Ferumoxytol-Enhanced MRI
inclusionCriteria:
* Osteonecrosis
* planned decompression surgery with autologous stem cell transplant
* Must have minimum age of 8 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Contraindications for magnetic resonance imaging
* Hemosiderosis/hemochromatosis ( patients can still be included in the non-ferumoxytol arm)
